settings.text: The Universal Tennis marketplace connects players with level-based play, leagues, teams, and analytics to track and improve their game. Ready to get out and play?

settings.heading: join universal tennis
settings.paragrap-title: It’s easier than ever to enjoy more tennis and connect with players near you with the Universal Tennis app.

settings.heading: Featured Players

settings.notetitle: The UTR Rating is the world’s most accurate rating system. All players are rated on the same 1.00-16.50 point global scale based on daily match results.

settings.heading: Are you an Australian player ?
settings.paragrap-title: Learn more about our partnership with Tennis Australia and how to sign up.

settings.heading: Become More
settings.paragrap-title: Level up your game with a Power Subscription for a low monthly fee. As a Power Player, you’ll access advanced analytics, discounted event fees, exclusive partner benefits, and much more. Pay just $12/month or $120/year. Save over time with free unlimited Verified UTR event fees.

settings.heading: $0 Verified Fees
settings.description: Power Players quickly get their subscription back in savings.

settings.heading: Get Granular
settings.description: See how you really stack up with two decimals and more.

settings.heading: Find Colleges that Fit
settings.description: Advanced search across 2,000 schools exclusively with Power.

settings.heading: Transforming Tennis in
settings.paragrap-title: The UTR Rating is the official rating for tennis in Australia! It’s easier than ever for Australians to find level-based play and enhance their tennis experience. Get started today by creating your free Competitive Player Profile, the first step to joining the Universal Tennis global community.

settings.heading: Already have a UTR Rating?
settings.description: If you have a UTR Rating but need a Tennis Australia Tennis ID, register on tennis.com.au for free and we will connect your two accounts.

settings.heading: complete now
settings.description: If you have a Tennis Australia Tennis ID but need a UTR Rating, start here to get your free UTR Rating and join the largest global tennis community. We will connect your two accounts.

settings.heading: Have neither?
settings.description: If you don't have a Tennis Australia Tennis ID or a UTR Rating, start here to get your free UTR Rating and join Universal Tennis, the largest global tennis community.

settings.heading: What is my Competitive Player Profile?
settings.row_content: All players competing in Australia should have a Competitive Player Profile established to simplify the process of entering endorsed events and leagues. So whether you play for fun at your local club or professionally on the UTR Pro Tennis Tour, your Competitive Player Profile will ensure you have the best playing experience for your level.

settings.heading: Flex Leagues For
settings.paragrap-title: It’s easy to play more tennis when you join a Flex League. Become a FREE Universal Tennis member and register to play four matches with players at your level. Leagues are five weeks long and available to adult and junior players. Level-based play ensures competitive matches, and you choose when and where you play around your schedule. Flex Leagues are live in more than 65 cities in the U.S. and Europe!

settings.heading: For
settings.block-list-items:
• Guaranteed 4 matches over 5 weeks
  • Self-organize matches around busy schedules
  • Improve by playing competitive matches
  • Compete for playoffs and prizes
  • Challenge any player in your league
  • Singles $27; Doubles $43

settings.heading: For
settings.block-list-items:
• New opponents and hitting partners at your leve
  • Improve your UTR for college recruiting
  • Get “match tough” with 4 matches over 5 weeks
  • Compete for playoffs and prizes
  • Challenge any player in your league
  • Singles $27; Doubles $43

settings.heading: 4 POINTS
settings.description: For Each Friend/Family Member You Refer

settings.heading: THE MORE YOU PLAY, The more points you earn
We'll help you
settings.paragrap-title: You only need a Power Subscription to get started! The background check is covered by Universal Tennis and a Power fee of $120/year is collected upon registration. Universal Tennis can help you book hits with a customized concierge service and marketing support, and will only take a small fee from each of your Paid Hits.
